title: Beautiful home in the heart of Angelino Heights!
posting_body: Advertised rent is net pricing of the unit when factoring in 1/2 of 2nd month free on a 12 month lease.
Actual rent paid to landlord is $3,895/month.
The Edgeware Apartment Homes caters to those looking to live, work and play in the heart of the historic Angelino Heights district in Echo Park.
Our residences maintain their historic Victorian charm with beautifully renovated brand-new interiors!
The entire property was just renovated from head-to-toe, so you and your friends can be the first to live in them and even possibly move in next door to one another!
3 bedroom craftsman bungalow home with private side yard & tandem parking.
*Small pets allowed with additional deposit and pet rent (under 25lbs) *
As a resident you will be walking distance from some of the world's finest restaurants, nightlife and shopping:
- Walking distance to Echo Park Lake and Sunset Boulevard
- Enjoy the Dodger Stadium fireworks at night
- Conveniently located just off the 101 and 110 freeways
- Less than 3 miles from the Staples Center, Convention Center and Downtown LA.
- Minutes away from the Silver Lake Farmers Market
- Minutes away from Sqirl *Management’s favorite lunch restaurant, their Full Monte chicken sandwich is a must try!*
Our beautifully RENOVATED units with no detail overlooked include:
- quartz countertops in kitchen and bath
- multiple closets with full mirrored doors and additional storage
Please call us for more information and to schedule your personal tour!
